availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward F. Dulin (Greenup Co, Ky, attorney and QM 22nd KY Inf (U.S.A.))

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Kentucky native. Attorney in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as quartermaster, enrolling on December 12, 1861, and resigning on January 10, 1862. Attorney in Greenup County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 837.
